question: Can a 25 year old son-in-law hug his 58 year old mother-in-law?
answer:
QUESTION

Can a 25 year old son-in-law hug his 58 year old mother-in-law? Can they handshake each other?

ANSWER


Share:

A son-in-law is a Mahram to his mother-in-law and there is no observance of Hijaab between them. It is also important to point out that if the son-in-law or mother-in-law experiences passion while hugging one another, that will fall in the category of incest which will result in her daughterâ€™s marriage being invalidated. It is, therefore, important for the mother-in-law and son-in-law to conduct themselves in a modest way.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
